constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 129 (Thursday, July 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BALDERSON:
H.R. 4621.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H3845]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 102 West Main Street in New Albany, Ohio, as the "Congressman Samuel L. Devine Post Office".
